markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Sluggish Bracelet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2388)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 193 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A silver charm bracelet, a _sluggish bracelet_ appears to be a [_bracelet of dashing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=415), granting you a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks. If the curse goes unrecognized, you think you can Activate it to gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed for 1 minute. Instead, its activation is as follows.

<document level="2" id="action-1949" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sluggish Bracelet
